text:
BackOffice Associates | Infrastructure Engineer | Seattle, Austin, or anywhere mostly in the US (Remote) | Full-time, Remote (US)

http://www.boaweb.com/company/careers/infrastructure-enginee...

BackOffice Associates, LLC is the leading provider of information governance. Last year we started a new infrastructure team and we're looking for an experienced software engineer with devops skills to help build out the new platform.

We write services in Go and Python, build on CircleCI, run containers on AWS, and use Envoy for our service mesh and front proxy.

We're a small remote team with a huge impact in the organization. If this sounds like you please shoot me an email, I'd love to chat [benwoodward at the domain above].
